subject: Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
Officiating (Sports)
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Texas Rangers catcher Yorvit Torrealba was suspended from Venezuela’s professional baseball league for 66 games for striking an umpire on Friday.
snippet: Texas Rangers catcher Yorvit Torrealba was suspended from Venezuela’s professional baseball league for 66 games for striking an umpire on Friday.
